Dear Mrs. Schmidt,
Thank you very much for your prompt answer
to iqy query of December 14 about Marshall McLuhan’s ’"Understanding
Media1*. The copy sent on 21 December has now reached me, and I
have asked our Administrative Officer to send you a cheque for it.
The copy sent on 21 November appears still to be looking for its
proper destination.
With all good wishes.
Ross McLean,
Research Director - Programme.
LESLIE M. MARSHALL
St. John’s
